name: OTHERS
goal:
Promoting human rights at an international level, monitoring human rights violations and endeavouring to stop them by working with national, international, judicial, administrative and non-governmental organisations as well as by taking part in processes at the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) and the relevant organs of the United Nations (UN).

Defending the fundamental rights of each individual or group; namely civil and political rights, economic rights, social and cultural rights; as well as international humanitarian rights, refugee rights, rights to a safe environment and sustainable development in Belgium as well as in the world.

Defending the right to asylum, fighting against racial hatred, racism, xenophobia as well as all types of discrimination based on nationality, ethnic origin, gender, age, health, a handicap, union activity, political opinions, religious beliefs, social or family situation.

Combating all infringements against fundamental rights, all crimes against humanity and genocides as well as torture and ill-treatment in all their manifestations.

Supporting victims through legal aid as well as social, material and medical assistance.

Our association pursues these objectives without any partisan or confessional commitment.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Conducting relations with EU governments as well as EU bodies in order to advocate human rights, submit reports, organise and participate in events.
